question:
[Evelyn] always goes to the park with her son [Darren] on Saturdays. [Christian] rushed to the hospital to find out that his wife and already given birth to a boy and had named him [Darren]. [Darren] meet his uncle, [Jonathan], at the baseball game, excited for their team to win. [Christian] and his son [Darren] went to the cinema together. [Pennie] just had a baby and presented the baby proudly to the new maternal grandmother, [Evelyn].
Question: How is [Jonathan] related to [Pennie]?
